name: VANILLA REFEREE'S GARDEN
description:
"In life and death, in the paradise between those, you will know your own crime"

A visual novel ADV where raw and dead intersect "Garden of the Vanilla Judgment"
Circle CHARON's latest work challenging straight from the theme of "life and death".
Heroine full voice, delivered in a large volume of 50 CGs (difference included 150 sheets or more).

Where are they going when they remember the sins committed in the past? Everything is told in the story.
The player will check with his / her eyes. The destiny of their fate.

【Title】 The vanilla referee's garden
【Genre】 Visual novel ADV where raw and dead cross
【Distribution format】 PC games for 15 years old and older
【Publication Date】 2018/08/10 Released at Comic Market 94
【Playing time】 About 4 ~ 5 hours
【END number】 TRUE END × 1 BAD END × 3
【Production Tools】 Tyrannoscript

※ This work includes grotesque, violence, partly sexual, shocking content.
We prohibit the purchase of those under 15 years old hard.
